Localization language. Default is "en". Valid values:

* "en" — English (by default)
* "ru" — Русский 
* "pl" — Polski

fields.name: fields
fields.help_text: Response field. The fields are separated with commas. Embedded fields are separated with dots. To exclude a field, use “-” in front of its name. In case the parameter is not defined, the method returns all fields. Maximum limit: 100.

fields.name: type
fields.help_text:
Search type. Default is "startswith". Valid values:

* "startswith" — Search by initial characters of player name. Minimum length: 3 characters. Maximum length: 24 characters. (by default)
* "exact" — Search by exact match of player name. Case insensitive. You can enter several names, separated with commas (up to 100).

fields.name: search
fields.help_text: Player name search string. Parameter "type" defines minimum length and type of search. Using the exact search type, you can enter several names, separated with commas. Maximum length: 24.

fields.name: limit
fields.help_text: Number of returned entries (fewer can be returned, but not more than 100). If the limit sent exceeds 100, a limit of None is applied (by default).

methods.description: Method returns partial list of players. The list is filtered by initial characters of user name and sorted alphabetically.

* "1" — Return vehicles available in the Garage. 
* "0" — Return vehicles that are no longer in the Garage.

Tournament status. Maximum limit: 100. Valid values:

* "upcoming" — Tournament is planned 
* "registration_started" — Players can apply to join the tournament 
* "registration_finished" — Registration has finished 
* "running" — The first match has started 
* "finished" — The last match among all stages has been played 
* "complete" — Tournament has been completed

fields.name: confirmed
fields.help_text: Number of confirmed teams in tournament

fields.name: min
fields.help_text: Minimum number of teams in tournament

fields.name: max
fields.help_text: Maximum number of teams available in tournament

fields.name: teams
max_players_count
fields.help_text: Maximum number of players per team in tournament

fields.help_text: Minimum number of players per team in tournament
Section contains information about links to tournament media resources

fields.name: image
fields.help_text: Image of media resource link; available only for links of "Custom" type

fields.name: media_links
fields
fields.help_text: Response field. The fields are separated with commas. Embedded fields are separated with dots. To exclude a field, use “-” in front of its name. In case the parameter is not defined, the method returns all fields. Maximum limit: 100.

fields.name: language
fields.help_text:
Localization language. Default is "en". Valid values:

* "en" — English (by default)
* "cs" — Čeština 
* "de" — Deutsch 
* "es" — Español 
* "fr" — Français 
* "pl" — Polski 
* "tr" — Türkçe

fields.name: tournament_id
fields.help_text: Tournament ID that can be retrieved from the [Tournaments list](/reference/all/wotb/tournaments/list/) method. Maximum limit: 25.

methods.description: Method returns detailed information on the specified tournament.

methods.name: Tournament teams

fields.name: fields
fields.help_text: Response field. The fields are separated with commas. Embedded fields are separated with dots. To exclude a field, use “-” in front of its name. In case the parameter is not defined, the method returns all fields. Maximum limit: 100.

Localization language. Default is "en". Valid values:

fields.name: tournament_id
fields.help_text: Tournament ID that can be retrieved from the [Tournaments list](/reference/all/wotb/tournaments/list/) method.

fields.name: page_no
fields.help_text: Result page number. Default is 1. Min value is 1.

fields.name: limit
fields.help_text: Number of returned entries. Default is 10. Min value is 1. Maximum value: 100.

fields.name: account_id
fields.help_text: ID of the account that belongs to the team. Maximum limit: 100.

fields.name: clan_id
fields.help_text: ID of the clan that owns the team. Maximum limit: 100.

fields.name: status
fields.help_text:
Team status. Maximum limit: 100. Valid values:

* "forming" — team roster is not yet confirmed 
* "confirmed" — team roster is confirmed 
* "disqualified" — team is disqualified

fields.name: search
fields.help_text: First letters in team name for search. Minimum length: 2 characters. Maximum length: 50 characters.

methods.description: Method returns list of teams in tournament.

methods.name: Tournament stage list

fields.name: type
fields.help_text:
Bracket type of the stage. Valid values:

 * RR — round robin

 * SE — single elimination

 * DE — double elimination

fields.name: state
fields.help_text:
Stage state. Valid values:

 * draft — stage created as draft

 * groups_ready —  stage has completed groups

 * schedule_ready — stage has a finalized schedule

 * complete — stage completed

fields.name: groups_count
fields.help_text: Number of groups in the stage

fields.name: rounds_count
fields.help_text: Number of tours in the stage

fields.name: rounds
fields.help_text: List of stage tours (numbers of tours)

fields.name: min_tier
fields.help_text: The allowed minimum vehicle tier for each player in the team

fields.name: max_tier
fields.help_text: The allowed maximum vehicle tier for each player in the team

fields.name: victory_limit
fields.help_text: Number of victories to win the match

fields.name: from_position
fields.help_text: Allows to get all team standings starting from a specific place, including this place

fields.name: to_position
fields.help_text: Allows to get all team standings up to a specific place, including this place

methods.description: Method returns tournament results of each team.

methods.name: Tournament matches

fields.name: round
fields.help_text: Tour number of the current match

fields.name: state
fields.help_text:
Match state. Valid values:

* "waiting_results" — Match is still in progress and there are no final results 
* "got_results" — Match was finished and there are final results 
* "canceled" — Match was cancelled 
* "upcoming" — Already scheduled match state

fields.name: next_match_for_winner
fields.help_text: ID of the following match for the winner

fields.name: next_match_for_looser
fields.help_text: ID of the following match for the loser
